issue.title: Is the new simulator working for anyone?

content.raw: @{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} That seems to work a lot better!  We are able to launch a single agent \(we have tried X1 and X4\).  We don’t currently get any video coming from the /X1/rgbd\_camera/image\_raw topic.  Does that work for you?  Was the problem above only happening due to launching multiple agents?  Will that be addressed soon?
content.html: @Alfredo Bencomo That seems to work a lot better! We are able to launch a single agent (we have tried X1 and X4). We don’t currently get any video coming from the /X1/rgbd_camera/image_raw topic. Does that work for you? Was the problem above only happening due to launching multiple agents? Will that be addressed soon?
